  • Constructor Details

    • TradeManager

      public TradeManager​(java.lang.String traderId) throws java.io.IOException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      For making trades
      Parameters:
      traderId - the user id of the trader
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - for errors in getting info from database
      UserNotFoundException - if the user id passed in doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - if the user id is of the wrong type

  • Method Details

    • requestTrade

      public Trade requestTrade​(java.lang.String userId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String thisUserOfferId, java.lang.String secondUserOfferId, int allowedEdits) throws TradableItemNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      Creates a new temporary trade
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user being traded with
      meetingTime - when the meeting takes place
      secondMeetingTime - when the second meeting takes place (make this time to be the same or earlier than the first meeting time for a permanent trade)
      meetingLocation - where the meeting takes place
      thisUserOfferId - the item id of that this current user is willing to offer
      secondUserOfferId - the item id that the user who got sent the trade is willing to offer
      allowedEdits - number of edits allowed before the trade is cancelled
      Returns:
      the trade object
      Throws:
      TradableItemNotFoundException - the items passed in for trading doesn't exist
      UserNotFoundException - the user that wants to be traded with doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - the item for trading cannot be traded
      CannotTradeException - cannot request a trade

    • requestLend

      public Trade requestLend​(java.lang.String userId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String thisUserOfferId, int allowedEdits) throws TradableItemNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      Requests to lend an item to someone
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to lend to
      meetingTime - when the meeting takes place
      secondMeetingTime - when the second meeting takes place (make this time to be the same or earlier than the first meeting time for a permanent trade)
      meetingLocation - where the meeting takes place
      thisUserOfferId - the item id of that this current user is willing to offer
      allowedEdits - number of edits allowed before the trade is cancelled
      Returns:
      the trade object
      Throws:
      TradableItemNotFoundException - the items passed in for trading doesn't exist
      UserNotFoundException - the user that wants to be traded with doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - the item for trading cannot be traded
      CannotTradeException - cannot request a trade

    • requestBorrow

      public Trade requestBorrow​(java.lang.String userId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String thatUserOfferId, int allowedEdits) throws TradableItemNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, CannotTradeException
      Requests to borrow an item from someone
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to borrow from
      meetingTime - when the meeting takes place
      secondMeetingTime - when the second meeting takes place (make this time to be the same or earlier than the first meeting time for a permanent trade)
      meetingLocation - where the meeting takes place
      thatUserOfferId - the item id to borrow
      allowedEdits - number of edits allowed before the trade is cancelled
      Returns:
      the trade object
      Throws:
      TradableItemNotFoundException - the items passed in for trading doesn't exist
      UserNotFoundException - the user that wants to be traded with doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - the item for trading cannot be traded
      CannotTradeException - cannot request a trade

    • denyTrade

      public void denyTrade​(java.lang.String tradeId) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      For denying a requested trade
      Parameters:
      tradeId - trade id
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - if the trade id wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the trade doesn't belong to this user

    • confirmFirstMeeting

      public void confirmFirstMeeting​(java.lang.String tradeId, boolean status) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Confirms the first meeting
      Parameters:
      tradeId - id of the trade
      status - if the meeting is confirmed and the trade happened
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - trade wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - this trade doesn't belong to this user

    • confirmRequest

      public boolean confirmRequest​(java.lang.String tradeId) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException, CannotTradeException
      For confirming a trade request
      Parameters:
      tradeId - the trade id
      Returns:
      if the request was confirmed
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - if the trade wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - if the user is not a trader
      UserNotFoundException - if the user doesn't exist
      CannotTradeException - if trading limitations prevent the trade from happening

    • editTrade

      public void editTrade​(java.lang.String tradeID, java.util.Date firstMeeting, java.util.Date secondMeeting, java.lang.String meetingLocation, int inventoryItemIndex, int traderInventoryItemIndex) throws CannotTradeException, TradeNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, TradableItemNotFoundException
      edits the trade object
      Parameters:
      tradeID - id of the trade
      firstMeeting - first meeting date object
      secondMeeting - second meeting date object
      meetingLocation - String of the meeting location
      inventoryItemIndex - index of the user's trade item
      traderInventoryItemIndex - index of the trader's trade item
      Throws:
      CannotTradeException - if the trade is not allowed
      AuthorizationException - if the user cannot access this trade
      TradableItemNotFoundException - couldn't find the item
      UserNotFoundException - if the user isn't found
      TradeNotFoundException - if the trade isn't found

    • getFrequentTraders

      public java.lang.String[] getFrequentTraders() throws AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException, TradeNotFoundException
      return the 3 most traded with Traders
      Returns:
      a String array of the usernames of the 3 most traded with Traders
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - user isn't a trader
      UserNotFoundException - user not found
      TradeNotFoundException - trade not found

    • confirmSecondMeeting

      public void confirmSecondMeeting​(java.lang.String tradeId, boolean status) throws TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, UserNotFoundException
      Confirms the second meeting
      Parameters:
      tradeId - id of the trade
      status - if the meeting is confirmed and the trade happened
      Throws:
      TradeNotFoundException - trade wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - this trade doesn't belong to this user
      UserNotFoundException - if the other user of the trade is not found

    • counterTradeOffer

      public java.lang.String counterTradeOffer​(java.lang.String tradeId, java.util.Date meetingTime, java.util.Date secondMeetingTime, java.lang.String meetingLocation, java.lang.String firstUserOffer, java.lang.String secondUserOffer) throws CannotTradeException, UserNotFoundException, TradeNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Sending a counter offer
      Parameters:
      tradeId - the trade id
      meetingTime - the new time of the trade
      secondMeetingTime - the second meeting time of the trade
      meetingLocation - the meeting location of the trade
      firstUserOffer - the tradable item id of the first user offer
      secondUserOffer - the tradable item id of the second user offer
      Returns:
      the id of the trade
      Throws:
      CannotTradeException - too many edits
      UserNotFoundException - couldn't find the user in the database
      TradeNotFoundException - this trade doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - this trade doesn't belong to this user

      Parameters:
      userId - id of the trader
      Returns:
      the trader object
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - the trader wasn't found
      AuthorizationException - the user was not a trader

    • getRecentTradeItems

      public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getRecentTradeItems() throws AuthorizationException, TradeNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, TradableItemNotFoundException
      Gets a list of the items used in trades
      Returns:
      list of unique items that the user has traded/received from a trade
      Throws:
